title: mumu68
author: mumu68
content: About 3 weeks ago I posted how BC.Game is refusing to let me withdraw my hard earned money from their website. They are stealing even my deposit! Here is the update:My account continues to remain locked after more than 20 days. BC game does not reply to emails or live support chat. They simply refuse to update on the matter. Scam bookmaker, stay away! Someone please do something, this is completely unacceptable behaviour. Admin should mark them as scammers in this forum.:

comments.body: Have you tried contacting them here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5088875.0They have an ANN thread here and it will be advise able for you to contact them directly why waiting for their mail response. But first move this to scam accusations of reputation where it could be given the attention that it deserved. With more detailed information

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: You may wanna move this thread to Scam Accusations https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=83.0 Also there is a format to follow, check the pinned threads.Provide some details and evidence that you have deposited. Everything that you think people should know that you are telling the truth like tx. Scams in crypto casinos are common but you will still need to post evidence to get people on your side. Not just that image you post. It doesn't look like anything but an amount in your account.

comments.author: mumu68
comments.body: What Slow Death said above is basically what happened. The casino ignores all my emails/live support messages. It's very unprofessional. No updates, no answers, nothing. More than 3 weeks.
